trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is a visual element, `value` and `element` are identical.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`是視覺化的項目，`value`和`element`完全相同。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that represents the original data value.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that represents the data value.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this item should not be re-virtualized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否此項目不應該重新虛擬化。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if you want to prevent revirtualization of this item; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果您想要防止 revirtualization 的這個項目。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the visual element that represents the data value.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體的資料值表示的視覺項目。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs.Value%2A> is a visual element, its property value will be the same as UIElement.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs.Value%2A>是視覺化的項目，其屬性值為 UIElement 相同。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that represents the data value.
Gets an <xref:System.Object> that represents the original data value.
If Value is a visual element, its property value will be the same as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs.UIElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為視覺項目，其屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs.UIElement%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs.UIElement%2A>相同

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that represents the original data value.
